column3:
<Emphasis>Souls from aether far, strangers from strange lands,
Yester with thine eyes, morrow by thine hands.</Emphasis>
Thou and thy fellow Warriors of Light hath led us from the darkness of the Seventh Umbral Era, as was writ in the <Emphasis>Divine Chronicles</Emphasis>.
That mine interpretation proved true hath been of great comfort to me.
“Knowledge dictates expectation, and expectation colors perspective.”
Out of the mouths of fiends and foes doth come truth on occasion.
Our knowledge is dwarfed by our ignorance, and what wisdom we possess hath been distorted by the passage of time.
The forgotten must be remembered, the crypted deciphered, if we are to comprehend the true nature of primal and Ascian.
